HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Trošak dostave za narudžbe čija je vrijednost manja od 40,00 € (301,38 kn) iznosi 4,00 € (30,14 kn). Za sve narudžbe iznad 40,00 € (301,38 kn) dostava je besplatna.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Isporuka na otoke se vrši sukladno rasporedu vožnje dostavne službe i može potrajati duže.

SUMMARY: Almagea.hr offers home delivery within Croatia via GLS. The shipping fee is 4,00 € for orders under 40,00 €, with free delivery for orders exceeding this amount. The standard delivery time is 2-5 business days, with potential delays for island deliveries. Cash on delivery is available with no extra charge. Other options like express delivery, weekend delivery, parcel shops, parcel lockers, or in-store pickup are not mentioned and appear to be unavailable. NOTABLE FEATURES: Key aspects are a clear free shipping threshold at 40,00 € and no surcharge for cash on delivery. The main limitation is the lack of alternative or expedited shipping methods. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is located in the 'Opći uvjeti poslovanja' (General Terms and Conditions). The details for the available home delivery service are clear, but a dedicated and more easily accessible shipping page would improve user experience by consolidating information and explicitly stating which services are not offered.
